json_to_edit.voice_over: The past whispered to me, blurring the lines between memory and reality.
json_to_edit.description: Emily's childhood memories materialize in her present-day apartment.
json_to_edit.name: Memories Unleashed
json_to_edit.scene_summary: Emily experiences her childhood memories coming to life in her apartment.

qa.action: Emily's apartment transforms, with elements of her childhood bedroom appearing.

hf.action: Emily reaches out to touch a swing that has materialized in her living room.

tr.action: Emily's eyes widen in wonder as she sees her childhood teddy bear on the couch.

xc.action: Camera follows Emily as she walks through her apartment, now filled with playground equipment.

ka.action: Emily looks out her window to see her old elementary school in place of the usual city view.

fn.action: Through Emily's eyes, we see her bathtub has turned into a small pond from her childhood.

af.action: Emily's hand grasps a locket containing a photo of her younger self, bridging past and present.

edit_command: Add a new shot before each existing shot, but don't change anything else in the scene.

updated_json.voice_over: The past whispered to me, blurring the lines between memory and reality.
updated_json.description: Emily's childhood memories materialize in her present-day apartment.
updated_json.name: Memories Unleashed
updated_json.scene_summary: Emily experiences her childhood memories coming to life in her apartment.

bx.action: A panoramic view of Emily's apartment, showing the contrast between modern furnishings and subtle hints of childhood nostalgia.

qa.action: Emily's apartment transforms, with elements of her childhood bedroom appearing.

yz.action: Emily's bare feet step onto a patch of grass growing through her apartment floor.

hf.action: Emily reaches out to touch a swing that has materialized in her living room.

lm.sfx_keywords: rustling of old pages, soft giggle
lm.action: Camera moves across Emily's bookshelf, where children's books start to appear between adult novels.

tr.action: Emily's eyes widen in wonder as she sees her childhood teddy bear on the couch.

op.action: Emily's living room wall fades away, revealing a misty park from her childhood.

xc.action: Camera follows Emily as she walks through her apartment, now filled with playground equipment.

rs.sfx_keywords: distant school bell, chalk on blackboard
rs.action: Emily's kitchen tilts and transforms, school desks appearing in place of the dining table.

ka.action: Emily looks out her window to see her old elementary school in place of the usual city view.

tu.action: A rubber duck floats into frame, bobbing gently on unseen water.

fn.action: Through Emily's eyes, we see her bathtub has turned into a small pond from her childhood.

vw.action: Extreme close-up of Emily's fingers tracing the intricate patterns on her childhood locket.

af.action: Emily's hand grasps a locket containing a photo of her younger self, bridging past and present.

label.rationale: we will add a new shot before each existing shot in the scene, effectively doubling the number of shots from 7 to 14. we'll create new, creative shots that complement the existing ones and enhance the overall nostalgic and dreamlike atmosphere of the scene. we'll update the "number_of_shots" field and add new entries to the "shots" dictionary, updating the "list_display_order" accordingly. the new shots will be designed to build up to the existing shots, creating a more immersive experience of emily's childhood memories coming to life.
